items.title: Russian official threatens Zelenskyy as Moscow claims Kyiv attacked Putin residence
items.description: A top Russian official on Monday issued personal threats against Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

items.title: WATCH:  'It sounds like a dragon': Bear living under house won't leave
items.description: A homeowner in Altadena, California, says it's terrifying to have the bear live in the crawl space under his home.
